name: vscode-github-soft-theme
description: Modern, light and easy on the eyes

scripts.publish-patch: vsce publish patch && git push --no-verify && git push origin --tags --no-verify
scripts.publish-minor: vsce publish minor && git push --no-verify && git push origin --tags --no-verify
scripts.publish-major: vsce publish major && git push --no-verify && git push origin --tags --no-verify
